EPalWazaID::AcidRain.Name: Acid Rain
EPalWazaID::AcidRain.Description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

EPalWazaID::AirCanon.Name: Air Cannon
EPalWazaID::AirCanon.Description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Deer_PushupHorn.Name: Antler Uppercut
EPalWazaID::Unique_Deer_PushupHorn.Description: Charges at foes and uses antlers to launch them into the air. If used while riding, the direction of the charge can be controlled.

EPalWazaID::WaterBall.Name: Aqua Burst
EPalWazaID::WaterBall.Description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::WaterGun.Name: Aqua Gun
EPalWazaID::WaterGun.Description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_JetDragon_JumpBeam.Name: Beam Comet
EPalWazaID::Unique_JetDragon_JumpBeam.Description: Flies at enemies on illuminated wings while firing innumerable beams. The beams explode on impact.

EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct_Bee.Name: Bee Quiet
EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct_Bee.Description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion, but receives the honor of falling in battle.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_Electric_E.Name: Blast Punch
EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_Electric_E.Description: Winds up its fist before pummeling an enemy with a flurry of electrically charged punches.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FlameBuffalo_FlameHor.Name: Blazing Horn
EPalWazaID::Unique_FlameBuffalo_FlameHor.Description: Takes aim and rushes at an enemy with a mad dash.

EPalWazaID::IcicleThrow.Name: Blizzard Spike
EPalWazaID::IcicleThrow.Description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at any enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FlowerDinosaur_Whip.Name: Botanical Smash
EPalWazaID::Unique_FlowerDinosaur_Whip.Description: Uses large tail to smash the ground in front of it, damaging enemies over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::BubbleShot.Name: Bubble Blast
EPalWazaID::BubbleShot.Description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NaughtyCat_CatPress.Name: Cat Press
EPalWazaID::Unique_NaughtyCat_CatPress.Description: Grins menacingly before leaping into the air and smashing foes with its body.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ChickenPal_ChickenPec.Name: Chicken Rush
EPalWazaID::Unique_ChickenPal_ChickenPec.Description: Flies at enemies in its sight, attacking them with its sharp beak.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FengyunDeeper_CloudTe.Name: Cloud Tempest
EPalWazaID::Unique_FengyunDeeper_CloudTe.Description: Charges forward while manipulating the atmosphere to create a pressurized wind tunnel around itself.

EPalWazaID::CrossThunder.Name: Cross Lightning
EPalWazaID::CrossThunder.Description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_MusclePunc.Name: Crushing Punch
EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_MusclePunc.Description: Winds up its fist before striking an enemy with a devastating punch.

EPalWazaID::FrostBreath.Name: Cryst Breath
EPalWazaID::FrostBreath.Description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceHorse_IceBladeAtta.Name: Crystal Wing
EPalWazaID::Unique_IceHorse_IceBladeAtta.Description: Dashes forward while creating frigid air around its wings, using them to slash enemies.

EPalWazaID::Unique_AmaterasuWolf_FireCha.Name: Daring Flames
EPalWazaID::Unique_AmaterasuWolf_FireCha.Description: Charges forward with great speed while clad in intense blue flames.

EPalWazaID::DarkBall.Name: Dark Ball
EPalWazaID::DarkBall.Description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Dark_DarkTo.Name: Dark Charge
EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Dark_DarkTo.Description: Charges forward while clad in a veil of dark flames. Flames continue to burn in its trajectory.

EPalWazaID::DarkLaser.Name: Dark Laser
EPalWazaID::DarkLaser.Description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

EPalWazaID::DarkLegion.Name: Dark Whisp
EPalWazaID::DarkLegion.Description: Generates several dark vortexes in the surrounding area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.Name: Divine Disaster
EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.Description: Charges forward while generating orbs of light that automatically capture enemies. The orbs automatically capture enemies, before releasing a barrage of lasers.

EPalWazaID::DragonBreath.Name: Draconic Breath
EPalWazaID::DragonBreath.Description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

EPalWazaID::DragonWave.Name: Dragon Burst
EPalWazaID::DragonWave.Description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

EPalWazaID::DragonCanon.Name: Dragon Cannon
EPalWazaID::DragonCanon.Description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DragonMeteor.Name: Dragon Meteor
EPalWazaID::DragonMeteor.Description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Grassmammoth_Earthqua.Name: Earth Impact
EPalWazaID::Unique_Grassmammoth_Earthqua.Description: Uses massive body to shake the earth, dealing damage over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::ThunderBall.Name: Electric Ball
EPalWazaID::ThunderBall.Description: Fires an electric ball that slowly pursues an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_CaptainPenguin_BodySl.Name: Emperor Slide
EPalWazaID::Unique_CaptainPenguin_BodySl.Description: Lies on its belly while generating frozen air all around it before sliding at enemies at high speed.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Garm_Bite.Name: Fierce Fang
EPalWazaID::Unique_Garm_Bite.Description: Swiftly leaps at an enemy and bites into them.

EPalWazaID::FireBall.Name: Fire Ball
EPalWazaID::FireBall.Description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

EPalWazaID::FlareArrow.Name: Flare Arrow
EPalWazaID::FlareArrow.Description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

EPalWazaID::FlareTornado.Name: Flare Storm
EPalWazaID::FlareTornado.Description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Alpaca_Tackle.Name: Fluffy Tackle
EPalWazaID::Unique_Alpaca_Tackle.Description: Charges forward while clad in an aura of sublime adorableness.

EPalWazaID::Unique_RobinHood_BowSnipe.Name: Focus Shot
EPalWazaID::Unique_RobinHood_BowSnipe.Description: Takes aim while drawing its bow before loosing a poweful shot at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_Tackle.Name: Forceful Charge
EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_Tackle.Description: Moves at high speeds to pursue its foe while releasing energy and a flurry of powerful punches.

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceDeer_IceHorn.Name: Freezing Charge
EPalWazaID::Unique_IceDeer_IceHorn.Description: Charges at an enemy with antlers adorned in ice.

EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Ice_I.Name: Frost Burst
EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Ice_I.Description: Raises its front legs and slams them into the ground causing frozen blasts under its enemies. It simultaneously pounds them with snow balls from above.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Eagle_GlidingNail.Name: Gale Claw
EPalWazaID::Unique_Eagle_GlidingNail.Description: Soars through the air with its talons outstretched forward.

EPalWazaID::Unique_HerculesBeetle_Beetle.Name: Giga Horn
EPalWazaID::Unique_HerculesBeetle_Beetle.Description: Skewers enemies with its four sturdy horns.

EPalWazaID::GrassTornado.Name: Grass Tornado
EPalWazaID::GrassTornado.Description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Gorilla_GroundPunch.Name: Ground Pound
EPalWazaID::Unique_Gorilla_GroundPunch.Description: Pounds the ground twice before leaping into the air and unleashing a powerful punch.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_GroundPunch.Name: Ground Smash
EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_GroundPunch.Description: Leaps high into the air before diving to the ground with a punch. The force of the impact deals damage over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Baphomet_SwallowKite.Name: Hellfire Claw
EPalWazaID::Unique_Baphomet_SwallowKite.Description: Draws near enemies using its left claw to slash them into the air before cutting them down with its right claw.

EPalWazaID::AquaJet.Name: Hydro Jet
EPalWazaID::AquaJet.Description: Hurls a high speed ball of water at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::HydroPump.Name: Hydro Laser
EPalWazaID::HydroPump.Description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Ronin_Iai.Name: Iaigiri
EPalWazaID::Unique_Ronin_Iai.Description: After Holding the sword, he appears in front of the enemy in an instant and unleashes a Ultra-fast sword draw attack.

EPalWazaID::IceMissile.Name: Ice Missile
EPalWazaID::IceMissile.Description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

EPalWazaID::BlizzardLance.Name: Iceberg
EPalWazaID::BlizzardLance.Description: Summons a sharp ice lance under the enemy.

EPalWazaID::IceBlade.Name: Icicle Cutter
EPalWazaID::IceBlade.Description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

EPalWazaID::FireBlast.Name: Ignis Blast
EPalWazaID::FireBlast.Description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Flamethrower.Name: Ignis Breath
EPalWazaID::Flamethrower.Description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

EPalWazaID::Inferno.Name: Ignis Rage
EPalWazaID::Inferno.Description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Tackle.Name: Ignis Slam
EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Tackle.Description: Charges forward while clad in a veil of flames. Flames continue to burn in its wake.

EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct.Name: Implode
EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct.Description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion. Becomes incapacitated afterwards.

EPalWazaID::Intimidate.Name: Intimidate
EPalWazaID::Intimidate.Description: Generates a fog of poison in front, causing the opponent to become poisoned.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Werewolf_Scratch.Name: Jumping Claw
EPalWazaID::Unique_Werewolf_Scratch.Description: Leaps forward and attacks twice with vicious claws imbued with dark energy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Thun.Name: Kerauno
EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Thun.Description: Summons a blade of lightning while leaping into the air before throwing it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingAlpaca_BodyPress.Name: Kingly Slam
EPalWazaID::Unique_KingAlpaca_BodyPress.Description: Leaps high into the air before smashing into an enemy with its massive body.

EPalWazaID::Thunderbolt.Name: Lightning Bolt
EPalWazaID::Thunderbolt.Description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.

EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_ElecScratch.Name: Lightning Claw
EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_ElecScratch.Description: After leaping at an enemy and tearing at it twice with its electrically charged claws, it attacks the ground, sending an electric shock throughout the area.

EPalWazaID::ThunderRain.Name: Lightning Rain
EPalWazaID::ThunderRain.Description: Calls lightning that strikes an enemy after a set amount of time has passed.

EPalWazaID::LineThunder.Name: Lightning Streak
EPalWazaID::LineThunder.Description: Generates a lightning bolt that moves forward in a line.

EPalWazaID::LightningStrike.Name: Lightning Strike
EPalWazaID::LightningStrike.Description: Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts that electrocute the surrounding area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Kirin_LightningTackle.Name: Lightning Tackle
EPalWazaID::Unique_Kirin_LightningTackle.Description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

EPalWazaID::LockonLaser.Name: Lock-on Laser
EPalWazaID::LockonLaser.Description: Takes aim at an enemy before firing a super high speed laser.

EPalWazaID::SelfExplosion.Name: Megaton Implode
EPalWazaID::SelfExplosion.Description: Risks life to cause a massive explosion. Those who perish for their duty become glistening stars in the night sky.

EPalWazaID::SpecialCutter.Name: Multicutter
EPalWazaID::SpecialCutter.Description: The user fires three high-speed blades of wind in quick succession that fly straight at enemies.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SakuraSaurus_SideTack.Name: Muscle Slam
EPalWazaID::Unique_SakuraSaurus_SideTack.Description: Turns sideways before tackling enemies in front of it, sending them flying into the air.

EPalWazaID::Unique_FairyDragon_FairyTorn.Name: Mystic Whirlwind
EPalWazaID::Unique_FairyDragon_FairyTorn.Description: Generates twin whirlwinds imbued with a mysterious power that pursues enemies.

EPalWazaID::ShadowBall.Name: Nightmare Ball
EPalWazaID::ShadowBall.Description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::HyperBeam.Name: Pal Blast
EPalWazaID::HyperBeam.Description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkCrow_TelePoke.Name: Phantom Peck
EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkCrow_TelePoke.Description: Teleports next to an enemy before attacking with its beak.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_FlareBird.Name: Phoenix Flare
EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_FlareBird.Description: Covers its body in a tornado of flames before charging forward.

EPalWazaID::ThunderFunnel.Name: Plasma Tornado
EPalWazaID::ThunderFunnel.Description: Creates two balls of electric energy that fire numerous bolts of lightning at enemies.

EPalWazaID::PoisonShot.Name: Poison Blast
EPalWazaID::PoisonShot.Description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::PoisonFog.Name: Poison Fog
EPalWazaID::PoisonFog.Description: Generates a fog of poison in front, causing the opponent to become poisoned.

EPalWazaID::PowerBall.Name: Power Bomb
EPalWazaID::PowerBall.Description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

EPalWazaID::PowerShot.Name: Power Shot
EPalWazaID::PowerShot.Description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

EPalWazaID::Psychokinesis.Name: Psycho Gravity
EPalWazaID::Psychokinesis.Description: Generates a fog of poison in front, causing the opponent to become poisoned.

EPalWazaID::Unique_PinkCat_CatPunch.Name: Punch Flurry
EPalWazaID::Unique_PinkCat_CatPunch.Description: Pursues enemies, repeatedly punching them with both fists.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Boar_Tackle.Name: Reckless Charge
EPalWazaID::Unique_Boar_Tackle.Description: Takes aim at a foe and rushes at them with a made charge.

EPalWazaID::RockLance.Name: Rock Lance
EPalWazaID::RockLance.Description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SheepBall_Roll.Name: Roly Poly
EPalWazaID::Unique_SheepBall_Roll.Description: Curls into a ball, rolling after any enemies in its way. Becomes dizzy and unable to move after the attack ends.

EPalWazaID::MudShot.Name: Sand Blast
EPalWazaID::MudShot.Description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::SandTornado.Name: Sand Tornado
EPalWazaID::SandTornado.Description: Creates two tornados of sand and sends them at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::SeedMachinegun.Name: Seed Machine Gun
EPalWazaID::SeedMachinegun.Description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

EPalWazaID::SeedMine.Name: Seed Mine
EPalWazaID::SeedMine.Description: Launches a deadly mine field of seeds that detonate when touched or after a few seconds. Enemies near a mine take damage.

EPalWazaID::DarkWave.Name: Shadow Burst
EPalWazaID::DarkWave.Description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

EPalWazaID::Unique_DrillGame_ShellAttack.Name: Shell Spin
EPalWazaID::Unique_DrillGame_ShellAttack.Description: Moves while spinning its whole body at high speeds. Drills through enemies, dealing continuous damage.

EPalWazaID::ElecWave.Name: Shockwave
EPalWazaID::ElecWave.Description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

EPalWazaID::SolarBeam.Name: Solar Blast
EPalWazaID::SolarBeam.Description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

EPalWazaID::SpreadPulse.Name: Spark Blast
EPalWazaID::SpreadPulse.Description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SaintCentaur_OneSpear.Name: Spear Thrust
EPalWazaID::Unique_SaintCentaur_OneSpear.Description: Clads itself in holy power before charging forward with its spear. The shield in its other hand protects from attacks during the charge.

EPalWazaID::RootAttack.Name: Spine Vine
EPalWazaID::RootAttack.Description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

EPalWazaID::Unique_QueenBee_SpinLance.Name: Spinning Lance
EPalWazaID::Unique_QueenBee_SpinLance.Description: Channels power into its staff, and unleashes it in a whirl.

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_LowRoundKick.Name: Spinning Roundhouse
EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_LowRoundKick.Description: Performs a spin kick with its strong legs, cutting down enemies over a wide area.

EPalWazaID::FireSeed.Name: Spirit Fire
EPalWazaID::FireSeed.Description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

EPalWazaID::GhostFlame.Name: Spirit Flame
EPalWazaID::GhostFlame.Description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

EPalWazaID::StoneShotgun.Name: Stone Blast
EPalWazaID::StoneShotgun.Description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

EPalWazaID::ThrowRock.Name: Stone Cannon
EPalWazaID::ThrowRock.Description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BluePlatypus_Toboggan.Name: Surfing Slam
EPalWazaID::Unique_BluePlatypus_Toboggan.Description: Slides on water to attack enemies.

EPalWazaID::Unique_HawkBird_Storm.Name: Tornado Attack
EPalWazaID::Unique_HawkBird_Storm.Description: Generates a tornado before soaring towards its target.

EPalWazaID::ThreeThunder.Name: Tri-Lightning
EPalWazaID::ThreeThunder.Description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackCentaur_TwoSpear.Name: Twin Spears
EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackCentaur_TwoSpear.Description: Clads its twin spears with vicious whirlwinds and charges forward, thrusting them one after the other.

EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Magma.Name: Volcanic Burst
EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Magma.Description: Raises its front legs before slamming them onto the ground, causing volcanic eruptions under its enemies. It simultaneously bombards them with volcanic bombs from above.

EPalWazaID::WindCutter.Name: Wind Cutter
EPalWazaID::WindCutter.Description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::WaterWave.Name: Curtain Splash
EPalWazaID::WaterWave.Description: Continously creates walls made from water columns at the enemy's location.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_FlameNightm.Name: Flame Waltz
EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_FlameNightm.Description: Dances gracefully while creating an extending ring of flames. Then, it fires mysterious flames that home in on enemies.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam.Name: Nightmare Bloom
EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam.Description: Disappears suddenly, then reappears while firing a barrage of beams. The beams spread like a beautiful flower in bloom.

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam_St.Name: Nightmare Ray
EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam_St.Description: Disappears suddenly, then reappears while firing a barrage of beams.

EPalWazaID::DarkCanon.Name: Dark Cannon
EPalWazaID::DarkCanon.Description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with dark energy at an enemy.

EPalWazaID::DarkPulse.Name: Umbral Surge
EPalWazaID::DarkPulse.Description: Fires a high speed ball of dark energy that spreads forward in a radial shape.

EPalWazaID::DarkArrow.Name: Dark Arrow
EPalWazaID::DarkArrow.Description: Fires off dark energy that homes in on an enemy.

EPalWazaID::Apocalypse.Name: Apocalypse
EPalWazaID::Apocalypse.Description: Generates several dark vortexes in the surrounding area.

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_ArmSmash.Name: Brawn Impact
EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_ArmSmash.Description: A powerful smashing attack using the full force of its muscular arms.

EPalWazaID::BeamSlicer.Name: Beam Slicer
EPalWazaID::BeamSlicer.Description: Mows down the frontal area with a beam imbued with dragon power. The area touched by the beam will also explode after a few moments.

EPalWazaID::BlastCannon.Name: Blast Cannon
EPalWazaID::BlastCannon.Description: Fires an energy bullet imbued with dragon power at the enemy's location. Upon impact, the bullet shatters and creates a frontal long-range explosion.

EPalWazaID::DiamondRain.Name: Diamond Rain
EPalWazaID::DiamondRain.Description: Creates numerous lumps of ice that are consecutively dropped on a foe's head.

EPalWazaID::IcicleLine.Name: Icicle Line
EPalWazaID::IcicleLine.Description: Generates a pillar of ice that moves in a straight line.

EPalWazaID::Thunderstorm.Name: Thunderstorm
EPalWazaID::Thunderstorm.Description: Generates a huge tornado of lightning that moves slowly towards the enemy.

EPalWazaID::TriSpark.Name: TriSpark
EPalWazaID::TriSpark.Description: A high-speed lightning ball that flies in a straight line. Simultaneously fires slow lightning balls that track the enemy.

EPalWazaID::FlameWall.Name: Flame Wall
EPalWazaID::FlameWall.Description: Creates a wall of flames at the enemy's location. The wall of flame will remain for a while, and deal damage to the enemies it touches.

EPalWazaID::VolcanicRain.Name: Volcanic Rain
EPalWazaID::VolcanicRain.Description: Fires countless volcanic bombs into the sky. After a while, the bombs rain down around their originator.

EPalWazaID::AirBlade.Name: Air Blade
EPalWazaID::AirBlade.Description: Sends out sharp blades of air in a fan shape.

EPalWazaID::Tremor.Name: Rockburst
EPalWazaID::Tremor.Description: Causes the ground to shake before hurling a massive stone mass at its surroundings.

EPalWazaID::SandTwister.Name: Sand Twister
EPalWazaID::SandTwister.Description: Creates multiple sand tornadoes. The tornadoes continuously spin in circles.

EPalWazaID::Unique_WingGolem_RoundCutter.Name: Ground Cutter
EPalWazaID::Unique_WingGolem_RoundCutter.Description: Knocklem's exclusive skill. Take a big swing and throws the ring on its back. The ring flies in a circular trajectory

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkScorpion_Pierce.Name: Jumping Stinger
EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkScorpion_Pierce.Description: Menasting's exclusive skill. Jumps hign and stabs its prey with its tail. The poison from its tail is deadly.

EPalWazaID::Unique_SifuDog_Counter.Name: Wholehearted Stance
EPalWazaID::Unique_SifuDog_Counter.Description: Dogen's exclusive skill. Adopts an aiki stance. While in stance, any attack is nullified, then instantly countered with a full force palm strike

EPalWazaID::Unique_WeaselDragon_FlyingTa.Name: Rocket Slam
EPalWazaID::Unique_WeaselDragon_FlyingTa.Description: Chillet's exclusive skill. Gathers a bit of strength and it leaps forward. When landing it's always scared so it closes its eyes.
